messages.messageText: So, I started off with this pic
...and
Look! I've removed the unwanted electric lines
<hr/>
<hr/>
That's great news !! I think I may have a few pics like that which you ma love to work upon.
Naah! thanks.. But, there are a few free tools available there you can try yourself
I used photopea.com which is basically a website, but, is as powerful as photoshop. I used the clone tool in it.
thanks @LifeHacks. Really appreciate the comments
What! I can do that too. And moreover I'm opensource.
Speaking of opensource, @LifeHacks - why didn't you try me?

Look guys ! you both are awesome. And we badly need you to be around to support opensource; but, photopea doesn't require any installation; and can work pretty much well from mobile too. Quite handy for some quick wins
That's so rich, coming from a guy who dumped opensource for some comfort
Well...maybe one day photopea will be made opnesource too.. who knows!
In your dreams! I make around 1 million a year just from the advertisements alone.
WHAT !!!
WHAT !!!
WHAT !!!
<hr/>
<hr/>

Newpost York
York, MA - Thursday August 30, 1978 - Seven Pages

Hi guys, I am Ivan, the creator of Photopea :).I made almost $1 million in the last 12 months, 90% from ads. The rest is from Premium (users paying to hide ads) and licensing a self-hosted version of Photopea.When you start your own project, you never know, if it will ever make $250k a year. But if you get hired, you can be quite sure, that you will never make more than $250k a year.Follow Photopea to see my progress :) http://facebook.com/photopea , http://twitter.com/photopeacom
